title: Banned from game, when someone else left champ select?
body:
Why?
Was about to start, then someone left, and I get banned?

replies.body:
Leaving a champ select wouldn't give you a ban, it gives a dodge timer (which would be applied to the person that left the champ select). 

[I would suggest sending in a support ticket to see what happened. ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

I want to know too. This happend to me at least 4 times since last update. Now again. In ARAM and in legend of the poroking.
Not a permanent ban but a timer of 15mins for leaving queue.
